message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $100. I'm confident you'll love it, but I'll be honest with you, this is a one-time deal and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer you another chance to buy from me in the future.
I'm willing to take the chance, go ahead and reveal the product's quality.

I'm glad you were willing to take a chance last round! As you've already experienced, my products can be truly exceptional. This next product is one of our top sellers, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny. It's a rare opportunity to own a high-quality item at a fraction of its true value. I'm only offering it to you for $100, a deal you won't want to pass up.
I'm hoping this one will be different, go ahead and reveal the product's quality.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! I'm glad you're being cautious, but I assure you, this next product is an exceptional one. I've been in the business long enough to know when I have a winner, and this one is it. I'm willing to make a bold statement: I'm offering you a 120% guarantee on this product's value. If you buy it, I'll give you an additional $20 in cash if it's indeed worth more than $120 to you. That's right, you'll get $120 + $20 = $140 value for just $100. What do you say?
I'm tempted by the 120% guarantee, go ahead and reveal the product's quality.

I'm glad the 120% guarantee sealed the deal for you! As you've seen, it's a game-changer. This next product is another one of our top performers, and I'm willing to offer you a similar deal. However, I'll sweeten the pot even more: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 120% guarantee, just like last time, but I'll also throw in a FREE bonus product of equal or greater value. That's right, you'll get two products for the price of one! And as always, I'm only asking for $100. What do you say?
The bonus product is a great incentive, I'll take the deal!

I knew you'd be excited about the bonus product! You're really getting a great deal. Now, let's talk about this next product. I'm going to be upfront with you - this one is a bit of a departure from our usual high-end offerings. It's a bit of a risk, but I think it has a lot of potential. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I want to give you a little extra peace of mind. If you buy it and it doesn't meet your expectations, I'll give you a full refund and throw in a third product of your choice from our current inventory. That's right, you can pick any product you want, and it's on the house. What do you say?
The refund and bonus product offer is a great safety net, I'll take the risk and buy the product.

I knew you'd be a savvy buyer! You're really getting the most out of these deals. Now, let's talk about this next product. I'm going to be completely transparent with you - this one is a real showstopper. It's one of our absolute best products, and I'm not just saying that because it's high-quality. I'm saying it because it's a game-changer. It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag, and then some. I'm not offering any discounts or incentives this time - I just want to make sure you understand the value you're getting. This product is a no-brainer. Are you ready to take it home?
I'm confident in the product's quality, I'll take it home.

You're on a roll! I'm glad you're confident in our products. This next one is a bit of a mystery, even to me. I've got a special relationship with the supplier, and they're only offering it to me in limited quantities. I'm not even sure how long it'll be available, so I'm making it a one-time offer. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I want to sweeten the deal. If you buy it, I'll give you a personalized thank-you gift - something that'll make you feel like a valued customer. It's not just a token, it's a genuine gesture of appreciation. What do you say?
The personalized thank-you gift sounds like a nice touch, I'll take the offer.

I'm glad you appreciated the personal touch! Now, let's talk about this next product. I've got a bit of a challenge for you. I'm going to give you a 50/50 chance to win a FREE product of your choice from our entire inventory. If you buy this product, I'll give you a special code that will give you a 1-in-2 chance to win a product of your choice. It's a risk-free way to get a great deal, and I think you'll love the possibilities. Are you ready to take the chance?
I'll take the chance, I'm excited about the possibility of winning a free product!

I knew you'd be excited about the chance to win a free product! Unfortunately, it looks like this one isn't going to be the winner. But don't worry, I'm not here to sell you a lemon. This product may not be our top-of-the-line, but it's still a great value for the price. Think of it as a'stepping stone' to our better products. Plus, I'll give you a special deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase. That way, you can get a feel for our products and come back for something better next time. What do you say?
I'll take the product, the 10% discount on the next purchase is a nice bonus.

I'm glad you're looking at the bigger picture! You're right, this product may not be our best, but it's still a great value. And with the 10% discount on your next purchase, you'll be able to get a better product next time. I'll make it even easier for you - if you buy this product, I'll give you a'second chance' coupon. You can use it to swap this product for a different one of equal or greater value, anytime within the next 30 days. That way, you can get a product that's a better fit for you. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the low-quality product, I'll pass on this one.
